TopicTitle: How to fix textures from broken parts?

Articles.Content:
There has been some of the parts that work fine, only missing their textures, I guess it has something to do on how the new update reads textures.

Any have an idea on how to fix them to properly detect the texture files?

I had this problem with the custom tank I made (shameless plug), and I was able to fix it by going into the part.cfg file and just deleting the line that read "texture = filename.png". I don't know if that will work for you, but it may be worth a shot.
